attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
With the imposition of gay rights about adoption without due regard to religious freedom, is this the thin end of the wedge to activly dismantle the Christian Church in this country?
We Christians have in many ways been the bedrock of civilisation and now our views are to be trampled on.  An exemtion in the law would have been a signal that there is still freedom of thought, freedom of speech and freedom of religion in this country.  Where will the dictorial impositions end?
